name: Taikou Risshiden II
overview: Taikou Risshiden II is a follow-up to Taikou Risshiden. The game has a new map which spreads to Shikoku, Kyushu and Tohoku so that the player character can attack or defend more castles and roam more towns. The player character can serve under other clan they should desire. They may do so by traveling to their location and by building friendly ties with them. In general, the sequel retains the basic gameplay principle of the first game, but expands the playing area.
